leftSection_5.title: Our 6-Step Process to Launch Your Abu Dhabi Mainland Business

items.title: Book a Free Consultation
items.description: Our expert consultants will evaluate your business objectives, identify the most suitable Abu Dhabi Mainland location, and guide you in selecting the right activities to ensure compliance with local regulations.

items.title: Choose Your Legal Structure
items.description: Register your trade name, select the ideal legal entity, and apply for the right license tailored to your business model.

items.title: Secure a Workspace
items.description: Depending on your legal structure, arrange a compliant workspace (minimum 200 sq. ft. for physical offices) and draft your Memorandum of Association (MOA) or appoint a local sponsor.

items.title: Submit Documents & Pay Fees
items.description: Provide all necessary documentation and settle the required fees with the Department of Economic Development (DED)

items.title: Obtain Your License
items.description: Receive approvals from relevant authorities based on your activity, secure your trade license, open a corporate bank account, and apply for visas (the number of visas depends on your office size).

items.title: Get Ongoing Support
items.description: Benefit from continuous assistance with license renewals, visa updates, and annual audits to ensure compliance and smooth operations.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: Can I own 100% of my business in Abu Dhabi mainland?
items.answer: Yes! Thanks to new FDI laws, the region now allows business owners and entrepreneurs to practice countless business activities with 100% foreign ownership.

items.question: How long does it take to set up a business in Abu Dhabi mainland?
items.answer: It generally takes 1-7 working days to get issued and registered in the Abu Dhabi Mainland, depending on document readiness, business activities, and location.

items.question: Does One Nexuz help businesses select the right business activity and legal structure?
items.answer: Yes, our expert consultants can help you identify the ideal business activity, legal entity, and license to align with your unique needs.

items.question: Is it necessary to get a local sponsor to set up my business in Abu Dhabi Mainland?
items.answer: Based on your business activity, you might need a local sponsor to get your business up and running.

items.question: Can I apply for multiple visas in Abu Dhabi mainland?
items.answer: Yes, mainland companies can apply for unlimited visas based on their office space.
